ilex.utils.stitch_components_together

stitch_components_together(x_list, y_list=None)[source]
Info:

Stitch data together, in the case that the x data segments are not contiguous, the difference between samples, assuming contigous within each segment, will be used to pad segments together with zeros

Parameters:

  • x_list (list) – List of data segments to patch together

  • y_list (list) – Optional, Also patch y list together, will follow x patching and stitch data along last axis

Returns:

patched x data array y_patch (ndarray): Optional, patched y data array

Return type:

x_patch (ndarray)
